text: @IsabelOakeshott OMG, have you any idea 😳 staff in our school been doing their bit during the pandemic, looking after children who are in (on a rota), home visits, phone calls etc etc, we've stepped up and more 😡 respect please 👍 #keyworkers #teachers #schools #clapforkeyworkers #coronavirus
